summary: The infamous sword of the Unicorns, forged from the very skeleton of a Unicorn
descriptionHtml:
I know it\'s not much at the moment I just threw this together in a couple of days, it\'s my very first mod... EVAR! YAY! I\'m pretty happy with it. As of the moment it is just a sword with relatively decent stats in which you can make at any forge. More than likely will be working on all parts of it for a while, then will add a quest of some sorts to be make it the only way you can obtain it, but alas my scripting sucks... So for now just enjoi the great Unicorn Sword!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
INSTALLATION:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Open or Extract the .zip file
2. Open your skyrim data folder
Default: C://Program Files*/Steam/Steamapps/Skyrim/Data/
3. Move the files in the opened skyrim data folder
4. If it asks to merge the files click: YES
5. Launch Skyrim
6. Click \"DATA FILES\" at the launcher
7. Make sure you checked \"Unicorn Sword.esp\"
8. Launch the game

*/Program Files(x86) also works if that\'s where your Skyrim files are

or use the Mod Manager, you should know how this goes ;D

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
HOW TO USE
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. Go to any forge
2. Go to Daedric
3. Forge using the random items it requires
4. Equip and enjoi!


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BUGS/ISSUES:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

None... as I know of


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ADDITIONAL NOTES
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Endors if you want, that just lets me know that you care. Plus give me the moral to keep on going... just for you ;D
And thanks to just anyone who downloads as well, there will be moar!
author: Zenbeta
